title: Samsung SE-208AB/TSBS External DVD-Writer - Black
description: Samsung SE-208AB/TSBS 8X Slim DVD+/-RW USB External Drive (Black).The Samsung Slim External DVD Writer was engineered for ultra-compatibility, Windows 7 compatibility and MAC OS compatible.What’s in the box: Samsung SE-208AB Slim External DVD-Writer USB2 (Black), USB Cable, Software Disc and 1 Year Limited Warranty.
